comments:
The behaviour is VM dependent.
I get an exception on both Sun 1.4.1 and IBM 1.3 JRE
but on the IBM 1.3 JRE the expression evaluation succeeds.

The two walkbacks are attached below.

Darin what is your VM configuration?

*** Bug 18649 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

I can repeat Erich's problem on Sun 1.3.1...

!ENTRY org.eclipse.jdt.launching 4 116 Jun 02, 2002 07:29:01.60
!MESSAGE Error occurred during initialization of VM
java/lang/NoClassDefFoundError: java/lang/Object

Related to bug 18627?

Problem was caused by fix for bug# 18434. The scrapbook was being launched 
incorrectly with an empty bootpath. It appears that the ibm 1.3.1 VM ignores an 
empty bootpath (still finds rt.jar), but other VMs obey the empty bootpath, and 
fail to launch. Fix was to add proper bootpath entries to the runtime classpath 
for the scrapbook eval VM.
Re-opening, since the fix did not make it into F2.

The org.eclipse.jdt.debug.ui plugin that fixes the problem is available at:

http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/index.cgi/~checkout~/jdt-debug-
home/patches/20020602.1/org.eclipse.jdt.debug.ui.zip?rev=1.1
*** Bug 19472 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
